course_description: Topics will include: Measure and integration theory on the real line as well as on a general measure space, Bounded linear functionals on L^p spaces. If time permits, Sobolev spaces and Fourier transforms will be introduced.
schedule_location: MW 8:30am-9:45am in Math & Science Center - E408
sections: Class Nbr: 2620, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 8:30-9:45a, Instructor: M. Taskovic, Status: Open
